messages.text:
Email on file differs by what might be a typo.

On Wed, Jun 6, 2012 at 12:47 PM, <rsc@golang.org> wrote:

> Reviewers: golang-dev_googlegroups.com,
>
> Message:
> Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,
>
> I'd like you to review this change to
> https://go.googlecode.com/hg/
>
>
> Description:
> A+C: Markus Sonderegger (individual CLA)
>
> Please review this at http://codereview.appspot.com/**6303047/<http://codereview.appspot.com/6303047/>
>
> Affected files:
>  M AUTHORS
>  M CONTRIBUTORS
>
>
> Index: AUTHORS
> ==============================**==============================**=======
> --- a/AUTHORS
> +++ b/AUTHORS
> @@ -135,6 +135,7 @@
>  Lucio De Re <lucio.dere@gmail.com>
>  Luit van Drongelen <luitvd@gmail.com>
>  Markus Duft <markus.duft@salomon.at>
> +Markus Sonderegger <marraison@gmail.com>
>  Martin Neubauer <m.ne@gmx.net>
>  Mateusz Czapliński <czapkofan@gmail.com>
>  Mathieu Lonjaret <mathieu.lonjaret@gmail.com>
> Index: CONTRIBUTORS
> ==============================**==============================**=======
> --- a/CONTRIBUTORS
> +++ b/CONTRIBUTORS
> @@ -202,6 +202,7 @@
>  Marcel van Lohuizen <mpvl@golang.org>
>  Mark Zavislak <zavislak@google.com>
>  Markus Duft <markus.duft@salomon.at>
> +Markus Sonderegger <marraison@gmail.com>
>  Martin Neubauer <m.ne@gmx.net>
>  Mateusz Czapliński <czapkofan@gmail.com>
>  Mathieu Lonjaret <mathieu.lonjaret@gmail.com>
>
>
>

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

LGTM then.

He should re-submit the CLA with the correct info, though.


On Wed, Jun 6, 2012 at 1:00 PM, Russ Cox <rsc@golang.org> wrote:

> The CLA was filled out for marrarison@gmail.com but I think that is
> pretty clearly a typo, since I've been sending email to
> marraison@gmail.com successfully.
>

NACK

On Wed, Jun 6, 2012 at 12:47 PM, <rsc@golang.org> wrote:

> Reviewers: golang-dev_googlegroups.com,
>
> Message:
> Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,
>

>
>

>

>

> @@ -135,6 +135,7 @@

>  Luit van Drongelen <luitvd@gmail.com>
>  Markus Duft <markus.duft@salomon.at>
> +Markus Sonderegger <marraison@gmail.com>
>  Martin Neubauer <m.ne@gmx.net>
>  Mateusz Czapliński <czapkofan@gmail.com>

> Index: CONTRIBUTORS

>  Mark Zavislak <zavislak@google.com>
>  Markus Duft <markus.duft@salomon.at>
> +Markus Sonderegger <marraison@gmail.com>
>  Martin Neubauer <m.ne@gmx.net>
>  Mateusz Czapliński <czapkofan@gmail.com>
>  Mathieu Lonjaret <mathieu.lonjaret@gmail.com>
>

The CLA was filled out for marrarison@gmail.com but I think that is
pretty clearly a typo, since I've been sending email to
marraison@gmail.com successfully.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=a6e2b17a16d7 ***

A+C: Markus Sonderegger (individual CLA)

R=golang-dev, bradfitz
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/6303047

subject: code review 6303047: A+C: Markus Sonderegger (individual CLA)
